contents.name: stream_samples
contents.description:
Asks device to stream a given number of samples
(clients will typically write `255` to this register every second or so, while streaming is required).

contents.name: streaming_interval
contents.description: Period between packets of data when streaming in milliseconds.

contents.name: forces
contents.description: Indicates the current forces acting on accelerometer.

contents.name: tilt_up
contents.description: Emitted when accelerometer is tilted in the given direction.

contents.name: tilt_down
contents.description: Emitted when accelerometer is tilted in the given direction.

contents.name: tilt_left
contents.description: Emitted when accelerometer is tilted in the given direction.

contents.name: tilt_right
contents.description: Emitted when accelerometer is tilted in the given direction.

contents.name: face_up
contents.description: Emitted when accelerometer is laying flat in the given direction.

contents.name: face_down
contents.description: Emitted when accelerometer is laying flat in the given direction.

contents.name: freefall
contents.description: Emitted when total force acting on accelerometer is much less than 1g.

contents.name: shake
contents.description: Emitted when forces change violently a few times.

contents.name: force_2g
contents.description: Emitted when force in any direction exceeds given threshold.

contents.name: force_3g
contents.description: Emitted when force in any direction exceeds given threshold.

contents.name: force_6g
contents.description: Emitted when force in any direction exceeds given threshold.

contents.name: force_8g
contents.description: Emitted when force in any direction exceeds given threshold.
